info.title: LeafLink Marketplace V2 API - Orders
info.description:
Order management and lifecycle operations

# Introduction
## HTTP Request Notes
All endpoints covered in this document are preceded by `https://{{domain}}/api/v2/` unless otherwise noted.

Available domains

- `app.leaflink.com` - production environment

- `www.sandbox.leaflink.com` - sandbox environment

- `www.leaflink-integrations.leaflink.com` - integrations sandbox environment

[Learn more about sandbox environments](https://developer.leaflink.com/brands/api/authorization/#sandbox-environments)


Request paths must end in a slash character ('/'). Those that do not will return a 400 (Bad Request) response.

## Dynamic Responses
Some of our API endpoints support dynamic responses. These
are responses that vary in content and/or object level payload size
according to request path or query parameters.

Available parameters are listed beneath endpoint definitions.

get.description:
List line items for all active companies where the user has the Manage Orders Received permission.

Line items can also be retrieved by order via /orders-received/{order_number}/line-items
or by company via /companies/{company_id}/line-items/

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand an id field into its full object.  Supported values include `product`.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by id

parameters.name: product__name
parameters.description: Filter by product name.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Filter by product id.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Filter by order number or external_id_seller. Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: is_sample
parameters.description: Filter by sample status.

parameters.name: order__created_on__gte
parameters.description: Filter by Order created_on, greater than or equal to

parameters.name: order__created_on__lte
parameters.description: Filter by Order created_on, less than or equal to

parameters.name: order__ship_date__gte
parameters.description: Filter by Order ship_date, greater than or equal to

parameters.name: order__ship_date__lte
parameters.description: Filter by Order ship_date, less than or equal to

parameters.name: order__modified__gte
parameters.description: Filter by Order modified, greater than or equal to

parameters.name: order__modified__lte
parameters.description: Filter by Order modified, less than or equal to

parameters.name: order__customer__cities
parameters.description: Filter by Order Customer cities, separated by commas.

parameters.name: order__customer__managers
parameters.description: Filter by Order Customer managers, separated by commas.

parameters.name: order__customers
parameters.description: Filter by Order Customer, separated by commas.

parameters.name: company_slug
parameters.description: Filter by seller company slug

parameters.name: order__service_zone
parameters.description: Filter by order__service_zone

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

post.description:
Create a line item for an existing order.

 > ⚠️ **WARNING - BETA FEATURE**
 >
 > This API is in active development and is subject to change.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand an id field into its full object.  Supported values include `product`.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this ordered product.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by id

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: Filter Event Logs by the username, first name, or last name of the person whose event created it.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Filter Event Logs by their associated order number.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

get.description: Retrieve an individual order event log by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this order event log.

get.description:
List payments for all active companies where the user has the Manage Orders Received permission.

Filter by order with /orders-received/{order_number}/payments/

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying the order payment.

get.description: List all OrderSalesReps under the company access scope.  For legacy auth, includes companies where the user has the `Can Manage Orders Received` permission.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

get.description: Retrieve an individual OrderSalesRep by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this order sales rep.

parameters.name: seller
parameters.description: Filter results by seller id

parameters.name: fields_include
parameters.description: Include only specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_exclude
parameters.description: Exclude specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_add
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `created_by` and `last_changed_by`

parameters.name: include_children
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `line_items`, `customer`, and `sales_reps`

parameters.name: seller__slug__iexact
parameters.description: Filter results the company slug on the seller side of the order.  Case-insensitive exact match.

parameters.name: modified__gte
parameters.description: Filter by the modified date, greater than or equal to

parameters.name: modified__lte
parameters.description: Filter by the modified date, less than or equal to

parameters.name: modified__gt
parameters.description: Filter by the modified date, greater than

parameters.name: modified__lt
parameters.description: Filter by the modified date, less than

parameters.name: external_id_seller
parameters.description: Filter by the number assigned to the order by the seller company

parameters.name: external_id_seller__icontains
parameters.description: Filter by the number assigned to the order by the seller company. Case-insensitive containment match: returns orders that contain the string

parameters.name: created_on__gte
parameters.description: Filter by the created_on date, greater than or equal to

parameters.name: created_on__lte
parameters.description: Filter by the created_on date, less than or equal to

parameters.name: created_on__gt
parameters.description: Filter by the created_on date, greater than

parameters.name: created_on__lt
parameters.description: Filter by the created_on date, less than

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Filter by the external_id_seller or the number

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter by the unique order number generated by LeafLink.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Filter by brand id

parameters.name: brand__in
parameters.description: Filter by multiple brand ids, separated by commas

parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: Filter by paid status

parameters.name: sales_rep
parameters.description: Filter by the user id of the sales rep assigned to an order.  This is the id field on the company-staff object.

parameters.name: classification
parameters.description: Filter by the classification of the license-type associated to the order

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Filter by the username, first name, or last name of the last person who edited the order

parameters.name: connected_to_metrc
parameters.description: Filter by whether or not they have metrc packages associated with their line items

parameters.name: manual
parameters.description: Filter by whether or not orders were manually created by the company on the seller side of the order

parameters.name: company_slug
parameters.description: Filter by the slug of seller company

parameters.name: service_zone
parameters.description: Filter Orders by service zone of customers

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: external_id_key
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Must be used with external_id_values.

parameters.name: external_id_values
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Multiple values separated by a comma.  Must be used with external_id_key.

get.description:
List received orders for all active companies where the user has the Manage Orders Received permission.

Per company via /companies/{company_id}/orders-received/

parameters.name: fields_include

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status. Multiple statuses can be submitted as comma-separated list. Case Insensitive.

parameters.name: status__not
parameters.description: Exclude by order status. Multiple statuses can be submitted as a comma-separated list. Case Insensitive.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Filter by brand id

parameters.name: brand__in
parameters.description: Filter by multiple brand ids, separated by commas

parameters.name: buyer
parameters.description: Filter by the id of the company on the buyer side of the order

parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: Filter by paid status

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Filter by the customer name or nickname for the company on the buyer side of the order

parameters.name: sales_rep
parameters.description: Filter by the user id of the sales rep assigned to an order.  This is the id field on the company-staff object.

parameters.name: classification
parameters.description: Filter by the classification of the license-type associated to the order

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Filter by the username, first name, or last name of the last person who edited the order

parameters.name: connected_to_metrc
parameters.description: Filter by whether or not they have metrc packages associated with their line items

parameters.name: manual
parameters.description: Filter by whether or not orders were manually created by the company on the seller side of the order

parameters.name: company_slug
parameters.description: Filter by the slug of seller company

parameters.name: service_zone
parameters.description: Filter Orders by service zone of customers

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: external_id_key
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Must be used with external_id_values.

parameters.name: external_id_values
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Multiple values separated by a comma.  Must be used with external_id_key.

post.description:
Create an Order. May create child LineItem objects in the same request.

__WARNING - BETA FEATURE:__ This API is in active development and is subject to change.

parameters.name: fields_include
parameters.description: Include only specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_exclude
parameters.description: Exclude specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_add
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `created_by` and `last_changed_by`

parameters.name: include_children
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `line_items`, `customer`, and `sales_reps`

patch.description: Update an Order. May update child LineItem objects in the same request.

delete.description: Delete a draft order. This operation is only available for draft orders.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Order number

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Order number

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Order transition action.  Available values include `submit`, `accept`, `fulfill`, `cancel`, `reject`, `ship`, and `complete`

created_on.description: Date and time the payment was created.

modified.description: Date and time the payment was last modified.

order.description: Number of the order this payment applies to.  See `number` on the order object.

recorded_by.description: Id of the user who recorded this payment.  See `id` on the company staff object.

recorder_name.description: Name of the user who recorded this payment.  See `display_name` on the company staff object.

payment_date.description: Date and time the payment was submitted on.

order.description: Number of the order this payment applies to.  See `number` on the order object.

recorded_by.description: Id of the user recording this payment.  See `id` on the company staff object.

payment_date.description: Date and time the payment was submitted on.

short_id.description: The _Order No._ displayed in the user interface

buyer.description: Company on the buy side of the order

seller.description: Company on the sell side of the order

source.description: Describes whether this was a buyer or seller generated order `"BGO"` `"SGO"`

created_by.description: User who created the order.  If BGO, full staff member details.  If SGO, the staff member's name.

created_on.description: Date and time that the order was created

last_edited_on.description: Date and time that the order was last edited

ship_date.description: Date and time the order was shipped

shipping_details.description: Shipping notes added by the seller

delivered_date.description: Date and time the order was delivered

notes.description: Additional notes added by the seller

sales_reps.description: Names of the sales reps assigned to the order

category.description: The id for the category this subcategory belongs to.  See `id` in the product-categories response.

OrderAddress.title: Delivery Address
OrderAddress.description: Read only delivery address as provided during order creation.
